mapper.select: select * from earolemenupart where 1=1 and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID} and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID} and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID} and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID}
mapper.delete: delete earolemenupart where 1=1 and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID} and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID} and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID} and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID}
